pullRequest.title: [BEAM-10674] Add Python CoGBK load test for streaming on Dataflow
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add CoGBK load test with streaming mode for Dataflow Python SDK.

Thank you for your contribution! Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

 Choose reviewer(s) and mention them in a comment (R: @username).
 Format the pull request title like [BEAM-XXX] Fixes bug in ApproximateQuantiles, where you replace BEAM-XXX with the appropriate JIRA issue, if applicable. This will automatically link the pull request to the issue.
 Update CHANGES.md with noteworthy changes.
 If this contribution is large, please file an Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement.

See the Contributor Guide for more tips on how to make review process smoother.

commit.message: [BEAM-10674] Python CoGBK: Remove unnecessary step. Adjust parameters to Java version of the test

nodes.bodyText: I think we should agree on the common name of this param. In combine I put jobType (mainly because Java test has jobType), but there is a possibility to change it since combine isn't merged yet.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -25,7 +25,7 @@ import InfluxDBCredentialsHelper
 
 def now = new Date().format("MMddHHmmss", TimeZone.getTimeZone('UTC'))
 
-def loadTestConfigurations = { datasetName ->
+def loadTestConfigurations = { mode, datasetName ->

nodes.bodyText: Now you can also ass now as ${now} :D
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -34,12 +34,12 @@ def loadTestConfigurations = { datasetName ->
       pipelineOptions: [
         project              : 'apache-beam-testing',
         region               : 'us-central1',
-        job_name             : 'load-tests-python-dataflow-batch-cogbk-1-' + now,
+        job_name             : "load-tests-python-dataflow-${mode}-cogbk-1-" + now,
